title: Electricity supply interrupted for consumers with unsettled bills?
content: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says measures would be taken to levy a surcharge or interrupt the power supply for the consumers who are yet to settle their electricity bills.Joining Ada Deranaâ€™s BIG FOCUS program earlier today, the PUCSL chairman Janaka Ratnayake said a directive in this regard would be issued tomorrow.
